Title: WayFormat
Description:
This standalone windows client application color formats the source code snippets in C, C++, C#, HTML, ASP, ASPX, XML,XAML, JScript, Java Script, Visual Basic, VB.Net, SQL, TSQL, PL/SQL and MSH (code name Monad) to style sheet enabled HTML code for publishing on a web site or in a blog. The tool has option to display line numbers, provide alternate line background color, and embed CSS.

This tool is just a desktop user interface to the powerful open source code provided by Manoli and available as a web tool at http://www.manoli.net/csharpformat/.
